SEARCH
Package Judges

Class TaskStatus

java.lang.Object
Judges.TaskStatus
public class TaskStatus extends Object
Maintains the status of various game metrics such as health points lost, numbers of different types of cards used, and the highest damage dealt to an opponent in one turn. This class is crucial for tracking progress towards game objectives and evaluating task completion.
